BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token. Get from https://t.me/botfather

CLIENT_ID.description: Your Google CLIENT_ID. Refer project docs.

CLIENT_SECRET.description: Your Google CLIENT_SECRET. Refer project docs.

BOT_OWNER.description: Telegram id of the bot owner.

AUTH_USERS.description: Telegram id of authorised users, separated by comma

VIDEO_DESCRIPTION.description: Any default description to be aded to the video.

VIDEO_TITLE_PREFIX.description: Any prefix to be added to the video's title.

VIDEO_TITLE_SUFFIX.description: Any suffix to be added to the video's title.

UPLOAD_MODE.description: The video's privacy status. Valid values for this property are: private, public, unlisted

DEBUG.description: Pass any value to set logging to debug level.
